## okWithValue() function

Creates a successful ParseResult containing the given value.

<b>Signature:</b>

```typescript
export declare function okWithValue<T>(offset: number, value: T): ParseResult<T>;
```

## Parameters

|  Parameter | Type | Description |
|  --- | --- | --- |
|  offset | <code>number</code> | The offset in the input at which to continue parsing |
|  value | <code>T</code> | The value resulting from applying the parser |

<b>Returns:</b>

`ParseResult<T>`
